11111122.content:
The Drecaw are small, approximately ten inches tall from head to foot, and are roughly humanoid in body plan, though the individual features. Take a glance at one and you don't generally think 'Human'. They have two arms, two legs, single head with visual and auditory sensors on it, but other than that things are rather different.

(Note, if you're bored by technical descriptions of biology skip down two paragraphs. I summarize :) )

Their body is chitin coated shell, but flexible due to many overlapping ring plates that shift and allow movement. The torso looks more or less human shaped but is a little taller and thinner by proportion. The arms and legs are pure muscle, more like an elephants trunk in appearance than a tentacle. They each end in four thin extensions like having four muscular (no bones inside) thumbs on hands and feet, but with no 'pad' in the center of the hand either. This has limited their dexterity somewhat, though fine detail work with those fiddly little digits is relatively easy for them. The head is a short fleshy tube that extends up and points forwards with four eyes set around the opening. No teeth are visible and they don't talk or breath through this opening, just eat... and something else that will be covered later. The hear through long ridges down this tube that stop just before the shoulders. These 'ear ridges' are flat to the skin, but rather sensitive to touch and their clothing tends to have a rigid strut over this that doesn't block sound. This often makes a clothed Drecaw look sort of like a hooded snake.

The head tube is not just for eating, though they do swallow food items that way. It is also for connecting to other life forms. Their brain is somewhat distributed, a thigh nerve bundle that wraps completely around that tube and reaches the end. This end, especially just inside the opening, has very little between the skin and the synapses of it's brain. Early in the Drecaw's evolution they learned to attatch to other mammals (yes, they are mammalian despite the chitinous body) and connect to that creatures nervous system. At first this just scared them away, but over long periods of time they evolved to literally connect to them completely, suborning the creatures consciousness with their own.

Basically Drecaws became thinking parasites, able to take over the bodies of other mammalian hosts by sucking onto the base of the brain stem (the base of the neck in humans) and the host would effectively go to sleep while the Drecaw took control of their body.

They had a vast civilization using many slave hosts, most of which were non-sapient, but not all. Eventually some rebelled and the empire collapsed from intense warfare. Nowadays most Drecaws are shot on site, but they still have a couple of colony worlds left. They are very much on the lookout for potential host worlds.

Like Earth.

What better place to test if humans are compatible hosts than a school. Take over a teacher and do varied tests, finding if all the students can be controlled or just some.
11111122.title: Drecaw.

111111222.content:
The Sleedarans are an odd mix of pacifist and aggressive predator. Six foot tall with a completely boneless structure they are biologically like six limbed squids, but don't really look like squids. Four tentacles below take the place of legs, two to the sides act like arms. The head is sort of distinct from the torso, unlike in squid, and they can rotate it almost 360 degrees! Surprisingly they only have one sex but their bodies faintly resemble a human female. It's close enough that with a braced rubber mask to hold themselves into the right shape they can pass as human (Or several other bipedal races in the galaxy). They even find human females attractive (if rather brittle).

They have never been accepted in galactic society and there is a very good reason. Sleedarans feel compelled to eat other sapients! Something about a creature knowing it is about to be devoured gets a Sleedaran tingling, almost unable to resist eating them. A few of them are even sexually excited by this and those few have given the race as a whole a bad name. They are, as I said, pacifists by nature. They never needed to hack, claw, bite any prey in their history. All they needed to do was catch it, open their mouths REAL wide, and swallow. They don't even constrict. This along with the fact they don't eat very often means they never really got much of an aggressive streak to their personality and when they evolved to be sapient this became exagerated.

Sleedaran society is very strict especially about showing emotion to others. If you get too scared, or seem to panicy in front of one the reflexive eating tends to come out and... GLOM! This generally isn't fatal. Sleedaran digestion takes a long time and the thought of digesting conscious, sapient beings is generally disgusting to them... but it has happened. Their law doesn't regard 'swallowing' someone as an offence, but rather 'not throwing them up afterwards'. Of course there are always the psychopaths in any species!

A Sleedaran could come to Earth and hide in a school, either just hiding away in a basement or actually pretending to be a student or teacher. None of their kind is accepted in the galaxy so a 'normal' Sleedaran might be interested in staying on a world where their race has never been heard of, just to be accepted for once. On the other hand a pervert Sleedaran might be interested in Earth for similar reasons. The Humans wouldn't know to look for them and they could get away with whatever they wanted... maybe.

You make your way down the small mountain outside the city. You carefully make your way into the city and watch the people walking along the sides of the road.

"Wow, so plain! No one is flying, well except for those metal things in the sky, and everyone is just walking or taking those machines. No creatures, no colorful devices, no magic at all!" You then notice something, everyone was dressed differently. Looking down at yourself, you definitely stand out.

You are just a bout 6 feet tall with long blond hair and blue eyes with a great body and large breasts, but that's not the problem. Your wearing a blue one piece robe with white and gold colored inscriptions and symbols on it, a blue full body cape, a wooden staff almost as tall as you, and a classic blue pointy mage's hat.

"Well, the point is NOT to stand out," you say to yourself. You spend the next several minutes watching the people pass by, to get an idea of what they are wearing. You back up a bit to make sure that no one is watching you. "Ok, time for my first spell here," you say as you raise level out your arms. You picture the outfit that you want as your hands start to glow. With one swift movement, you place your hands on yourself and are completely encased in the glow that was on your hands.

When the light dissipates, your now wearing a black blue shirt and a white skirt with white shoes. "This should work," you say as you pick up your things and head out into the crowds of people.

After a few hours of searching, you come across a house for sale that you like. It's a little ways out of the city, in a small urban area. It's an old dark brown house, it looks like those old, falling down houses in horror movies. The yard is overgrown and there's trash in it. It is 3 floors to it, but it's obviously in disrepair, though there are houses to the left, right, and across the street from the house. You think that this could be the perfect house for you, it just needs a little work.

You head for the place that is selling the house, and after everything is taken care of, thank god for magic documents you say to yourself, the house is now yours, for a lot less than it should be.

Back at your new house, you open the old creaky black gates and make along the overgrown path to the front door. You unlock the door and open it, the inside is also a mess. There are holes in the floor, wall, and ceiling. The furniture is all torn and unusable, and there is a fine layer of dust covering everything.

Dropping your bag, you say, "well, this should be bad, but this will be easy for someone like me, though I better not fix up everything at once, can't draw attention to myself".

"Alright, time to get started!" you say as you drop yourself and pull out one of your books.

125111111111111111211111111111111.title: Keep looking.

1251111111111111112111111111111111.content:
"What a day," Megan gasped as she collapsed onto her sofa. She lived in the school dorms, alone since hers was the room left over, and she had a bed all to herself, a TV, and one desk. Her parents didn't really keep in touch - they loved her, and they loved each other, and she loved them, and they all knew they loved each other, but her parents just weren't at their happiest when they were together. They were always off doing their own thing - her father was a professional Chess player, and a fairly well-known one, and her mother was a professional scatologist. Over the dinner table, Dad would always talk about how close he was to winning the last game he played, or he'd recite an entire Chess game by rote, and Mom would always talk about how poop could be used to fuel the world's power supply.

Nobody asked Megan how her day was. Nobody really cared. They enjoyed being together, but they loved their work even more. Which is why Megan ran away into the school dormitories. There, at least, she could be alone.

She lazily turned the news on. It was a special on what she'd been doing over the past day... wait... those weren't her conquests! Somebody else had been doing the same thing!

"Hey, Voice," she said.

"I KNOW. SOMETHING ALONG THE LINES OF, 'YOU DIDN'T TELL ME THERE WERE OTHER PEOPLE WORKING TOWARDS THE SAME GOAL.' RIGHT?"

"Well... you're not wrong, but... didn't you tell me that I was the only one who could do this?"

"I MAY HAVE EXAGGERATED A BIT. CERTAINLY, FINDING SOMEBODY WHO CAN DO SO IS LIKE SEARCHING FOR A NEEDLE IN A HAYSTACK. BUT YOU ARE NOT NECESSARILY UNIQUE. AND IT APPEARS YOU HAVE COLLEAGUES."

“Good,” Megan said, smiling. “That’s a load off my back. So, you went and gave somebody else a watch like mine, right?”

“THAT IS INCORRECT ON TWO COUNTS. FIRST, THEIR WATCH WILL NOT HAVE BEEN EXACTLY LIKE YOURS. AND SECONDLY, I CHOSE YOU AS MY CHAMPION. I CANNOT HAVE CHOSEN ANOTHER.”

“So, there are… others like you?”

“I HAD THOUGHT OTHERWISE. HOWEVER, IT APPEARS THAT IS CORRECT.”

“I see,” Megan said, and was just about to relax again when there came a knock at the door. “Coming,” she said loudly.
1251111111111111112111111111111111.title: This happens.

12511111111111111121111111111111111.content:
It was her guy-friend, Derek. He wasn't as solidly built as his name implied, but he was amazingly intelligent, well-versed in both school-appropriate subjects and current events, not to mention pop culture, and he had a photographic memory to boot. And he was perceptive. His only bad subject was PE.

“Oh, hi, Derek,” Megan squealed as she turned off the TV with the remote. “What are you doing in the girls’ dorm?”

“I came to say hi, for one,” Derek said. “May I come in for a sec?”

Megan nodded, closed the door behind him, and said, “Sorry about this. If you’d called ahead, I would have gotten the place cleaned up.”

“A FRIEND OF YOURS?” the voice interrupted.

“Not now!” Megan hissed.

“Not now what?” Derek asked, having overheard.

“Nothing, never mind! You… seem to have gotten a new watch!”

“Oh, this?” Derek asked, tapping his jet-black, designer-quality electronic watch. “I got tired of leather, that’s all.” He also seemed kind of uncomfortable. “So, so… so have you, I note.” He looked directly at Megan’s transformation watch, which also looked kind of high-tech, come to think of it.

“I guess,” Megan said. “I felt like a change.” She ignored the sick feeling in her stomach about lying to Derek, but he wasn’t as much of a friend as the other two were. It wasn’t that she didn’t trust him to keep the secret, just… she was afraid of his reaction. He wasn’t really a violence person, and if he learned that she was fighting, for whatever reason…

“I SEE. YOU LIKE HIM,” the voice said, its monotone somehow managing to project amusement. Megan immediately blushed.

“So, what… what about the recent, you know… invasions?” Megan asked, just to hold a conversation.

“Yes, that’s the other reason I came to you,” Derek said. “There’s been two girls running around beating the crap out of the aliens. Do you know who they are, by any chance?”

“Who…? No, I don’t, how would I?” Megan asked, her voice higher than normal. “Well, if that’s all, could you please leave? Like, now?”

“Overstayed my welcome, have I? Fine, I’ll go,” Derek said. “Well, if you find anything, you know who to tell. Thanks, and bye.” He left.

Megan released a breath she hadn’t known she was holding. “That was close,” she said.

“IT COULD EASILY HAVE BEEN CLOSER,” the voice observed. “AND THAT WOULD NOT NECESSARILY HAVE BEEN A BAD THING.”

“Trying to play matchmaker, Voce?” Megan asked tiredly. “Forget it. I’m not in the mood.”

“YOU MISTAKE MY IMPLICATION. I MEANT TO STATE THAT HE HAD UNCANNY KNOWLEDGE ABOUT OUR SITUATION, AND TIMING THINGS CLOSER COULD WELL HAVE REVEALED HIS SOURCE OF INFORMATION.”

“It’s himself,” Megan said. “He’s always been like that. Well, not always always, but you know what I mean. He’s smart, observant, and he has a photographic memory. It’s no wonder he suspects me of being one of the girls on the vanguard.”

“THAT MAY BE SO,” the Voice said. “BUT HOW DID HE KNOW THAT THERE WAS MORE THAN ONE?”

Now that the Voice mentioned it, Megan did think it was suspicious. “Yeah, good point,” she said. “I’ll ask him at school tomorrow.”
12511111111111111121111111111111111.title: It's someone she knows.

choices: Bring him out to a secluded place.
125111111111111111211111111111111111.content:
During lunch break, Megan talked to Derek about their conversation yesterday evening.

"So, Derek," she said, while treating him to a hamburger in order to grease him up, "how did you..."

"CAREFUL," the Voice said.

"What made you think there were two girls?" Megan finished.

Derek held up a finger while he chewed and swallowed a big bite of hamburger. "Okay, first, I talked to those chatterbox girlfriends of yours. You know, Ellie and Sarah? They said that a mysterious girl with an overall blue color scheme saved them from the monsters. Then my mom called and said she was saved from monsters by a girl with an overall yellow color scheme. Two and two.”

It made sense. In fact, it was surprisingly simple for one of Derek’s conclusions. “I see…” Megan said. “Makes sense.” So it was just a coincidence. She sighed.

“So, there are at least two more of them, maybe more,” Derek concluded.

“At least two more?” Megan asked. “What makes you say that?”

“We have blue and yellow,” Derek said. “Since this is starting to look like frickin’ Power Rangers, we’re missing a primary color. Red.”

“THAT IS NOT NECESSARILY THE CASE,” the Voice said. “IT IS ENTIRELY POSSIBLE THAT ONLY THE TWO OF US SUR… I MEAN, THAT THERE ARE ONLY TWO OF US HERE.”

“Maybe not,” Megan said, responding to the Voice unconsciously. “But maybe there are more.”

“Excuse me?” Derek asked.

“I mean, maybe…” Megan said. “Well, maybe it’s not supposed to look like Power Rangers?”

“Pardon?”

“The whole Power Rangers thing is just a stereotype after all,” Megan said, almost panicking but managing to barely avoid it. “I mean, if they were following the stereotype, that’d be a pretty big coincidence, right? I mean, one of them has blue hair. It’d be kind of…” she trailed off, not even knowing what she was saying anymore.

“No,” Derek said. “The blue hair actually supports my point. But tell me something, Megan.”

“Yeah? What is it, Derek?” Megan asked.

“CAREFUL…” the Voice warned.

“I was kind of suspicious about how you didn’t immediately contest my point that there were two girls,” Derek said. “So I did some snooping around. Megan, your schedule around the time of each incident provides you with a solid alibi, for lack of a better term. You stayed at home during the first such incident, you didn’t go into the bathroom that eventually got the hole in it, and according to Ellie and Sarah, you weren’t there when they were attacked. You can’t have seen either girl. So tell me, how did you know that one of them has blue hair?”

Uh oh…

“Well, didn’t you say so earlier?” Megan asked. “You said one of the girls had on a blue vest and had blue hair, and – “

“I only said that she had an overall blue color scheme,” Derek said. “And while I’m at it, how did you know that she was wearing a vest?”

Snap! Went the snare trap in Megan’s mind. She was caught, and she knew it. The cafeteria was crowded; a bunch of people would know if she said something like, “I’m actually the blue one.” What to do…

"(WELL...I CANNOT SAY FOR CERTAIN, BUT I DO REMEMBER MENTIONING THIS TO YOU. THAT THEY ARE KNOW FOR THIS. FOR BREEDING OR BETTER ENTERTAINMENT. MOST PREFER WOMEN. THE MEN ARE OFTEN USED FOR LABOR. 125121.content:
A special class at the Cinter Highschool Is being held this year. A genius was coming to this school to teach a special class, well, actually it was for his/her experiments. This person donated a ton of money to the school to set up this class. He/she wanted 30 students. 15 male and 15 female. The students that took this class were made sure that the school and the teacher were not responsible for what happened to them during their class.

But what do they get out of it? A guarantee that by the end of the year, they themselves would become geniuses.
And Katie signed up for this class.

Welcome to The Assistants.
125121.title: The Assistants

1251211.content:
The classroom is fairly straightforward. A window along the left wall, 30 chairs, the teacher's desk with a whiteboard directly behind.

Katie takes a seat, 1/2 the day already having gone by, she, as well as the other 29 students wait for their teacher.

"Does anybody know what were going to do?".

"Don't ask me, I have no idea".

"I dont think anyone does".

"Yeah. I wonder who this teacher is".

The door opens, and their teacher walks in. A girl, in her 20s enters the classroom and places a box on her desk. She is tall, with long black hair, blue eyes, and a large chest. She begins talking and writing on the board.

"My name is Estell Y. Vistil. And all 30 of you will be helping me until the end of the year. There are a few rules you must follow".

1. No one outside of class is to know of what happends in here or where I take you.

2. What I say goes. I tell you to do something, take something, test something, you do it.

3. The school and myself is not responsible for what happens to any of you. But that was already taken care of when you signed that paper. Though nothing permanent should happen.

"Follow these 3 simple rules and you'll get what I promised at the end of the year. Welcome to the Assistants".

Back at her desk, she pulls out a 30 glasses and aglass jar containing some kind of blue substance in it. She pours an equal amount into the 30 glasses and passes them around class.

"Before we begin, I must ask all of you to drink what I just gave you, its for your own good". They do, some quicker than others.

"Good. Any questions?".

"Um, I have one", a nervous girl asks. "What exactly are we suppose to do?".

".....Oh. I didn't explain that yet, did I? Sorry, I'm getting ahead of myself again. What you all will be doing is helping me with me test experiments, theories, and a few other things that are a bit...bizzare".

"Bizzare? How?".

"It's easier if I show you. Lets see.....you, get up and come here, I'll show you all what we will do by doing the first test".

"S-swallow it?".

"Yes".

"W-what will it do?".

She puts the green ball into her mouth and drinks the water. Knowing that something will happen to her, she tenses up.

The teacher looks at her watch, "how odd. It should of taken affect by now.....Was the dosage not strong enough?.....Hmmm? Looks like its starting to work", saying as she saw Katie arch her back. Her eyes and mouth open and she suddenly falls to her knees.

Her body pulsates over and over as she grabs her shoulders, the students start to panic.

"What is going on?".

"I-is she alright?".

"What did you do to her?"

"Calm down, all of you. She will be fine".

The rest of the class gasps and stares in total surprise as Katie starts to.....

Tearing and ripping echo through the classroom as Katie's clothes fall apart and eventuall snap off of her, no longer able to take the strain. Her body grows until she is forced to sit and duck her head so she wouldn't hit the ceiling. Some of the front desks are pushed back and she is forced against the wall with the window, barely able to move with her legs closed and her arms covering her chest.

Everyone is staring at her, and she is looses it. She screams and yells for them to not look at her, forcing everyone in the class to cover their ears at her loud voice.

"I see.....The delay was unexpected, but it worked. Do I need to increase the amount of the activator? And the size she now is, the dosage may have been too pure.....". Their teacher walks over to Katie and gives her a few pokes. "Do you feel ok? Is anything wrong?".

Katie looks at her, with tears in her eyes. "....Why?.....How could you do this to me?".

"? What are you talking about? You signed up for this. Things like this will happne frequently in this class. You all are suppose to be my assistants. I mean its not like you'll stay like this".

One of them jumps onto one of her arms and climbs up to her face. "hey, its pretty nice up here!", he says, sitting on one of her shoulders. "I'm Kevin, nice to meet you Katie. I guess we'll be together for a while". He touches the side of her face with a single hand, "you've got a nice face. And its so soft too".

Surprised by this, she leans forward a bit, causing Kevin to lose his balance and fall forward. At least he gets a soft landing. He falls on her breasts, and she turns bright red. Instincively, she puts more pressure on her chest with her arms as she tries to cover them up even better than she already was. "K-katie *cough* please calm down! Your squishing me!".
